name: Sarah M.
review: Lifetime Home Services did an amazing job on our epoxy garage floor. The crew was professional, fast, and the results are stunning! Highly recommend.

name: James R.
review: We had radon mitigation and duct cleaning done. Both teams were knowledgeable and left our home spotless. Great experience!

name: Linda T.
review: The StruXure pergola is a game changer for our backyard. The process was smooth from quote to install.

name: Mike D.
review: Very happy with the Aeroseal duct sealing. Noticeable difference in comfort and dust. Would use again!
